by.horant.fintask.dao

Interface OrderDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SQLOrderDao

    public interface OrderDAO
    The user of this interface undertakes to implement interaction with the database through the implementation of a functional for working with objects of the order type. includes such features (methods) as checking the availability of all necessary prescriptions for drugs included in this order, adding an order to the database and order completion.
    Author:
    Anton Horbach

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addOrder(User user, Order order)
      Adds an order to the database.
      java.util.List<Medicine> checkRecipes(Order order)
      Checks the availability of all necessary prescriptions for drugs included in this order.
      boolean completeOrder(int orderId)
      Completes order.

    • Method Detail

      • checkRecipes

        java.util.List<Medicine> checkRecipes(Order order)
                               throws DaoException
        Checks the availability of all necessary prescriptions for drugs included in this order.
        Parameters:
        order - order which we check for all required recipes.
        Returns:
        a collection of drugs without the appropriate recipes in the order. If all recipes are present, returns an empty collection.
        Throws:
        DaoException

      • addOrder

        boolean addOrder(User user,
                 Order order)
          throws DaoException
        Adds an order to the database.
        Parameters:
        user - user in whose name the order is issued.
        order - the order we want to add.
        Returns:
        true - if order was added, false - if order wasn't added.
        Throws:
        DaoException

      • completeOrder

        boolean completeOrder(int orderId)
               throws DaoException
        Completes order.
        Parameters:
        orderId - order id that we want to add.
        Returns:
        true - if order was completed, false - if order wasn't completed.
        Throws:
        DaoException
